channel.title: Chance percentages for the King
channel.description:
To make it interesting remove the 20% chance for Neutral put it to 15% and Put a Psycho King chance to 5%. Starting Psycho King wins with NK. If NK dies he can still win with NK. This would be a very interesting change and stops NK from just Bypassing Night Immunity and killing King all the time.
Original Psycho King class card:
Psycho King - King
Day Ability 1 - Royal Finger (Royal finger desc here)
Day Ability 2 - Decide Fate (Decide fate desc here)
Night Ability 1 - Guards! Send a guard to investigative someone to see if they are the NK, or guard yourself making yourself Night Immune. (infinite)
Night Ability 2 - Order Execution (order execution desc here)

item.title: Chance percentages for the King
item.dc:creator: NightX
item.description:
I don’t like it because the whole point of NK is being alone, with no allies. I suppose it’s rare, but I don’t like it. Also it is so infrequent that NK will still probably kill King.

Read full topic

item.title: Chance percentages for the King
item.dc:creator: KyoDaz
item.description:
It also decreases NK killing the King all the time. (that was one of the main goals)

Read full topic

item.title: Chance percentages for the King
item.dc:creator: KyoDaz
item.description:
It adds a whole new area for randomness and a very creative idea I believe. And something to “wow” at when you roll it.

Read full topic

item.title: Chance percentages for the King
item.dc:creator: NightX
item.description:
What’s the benefit from having this? Psycho King only exists to have something for Reaper and Possessor to become.

Read full topic

item.title: Chance percentages for the King
item.dc:creator: NuclearBurrito
item.description:
Including guards? How is he a psycho king then?

item.title: Chance percentages for the King
item.dc:creator: KyoDaz
item.description:
He would have the exact same abilities as every starting king.

item.title: Chance percentages for the King
item.dc:creator: NuclearBurrito
item.description:
It would make everyone super paranoid about the king thought. Also it would be very anti BD to have a constant KPN of 4 from scum. Also they would make him use order exe to prove.

Read full topic

item.description:
To make it interesting remove the 20% chance for Neutral put it to 15% and Put a Psycho King chance to 5%.
Starting Psycho King wins with NK. If NK dies he can still win with NK. This would be a very interesting change and stops NK from just Bypassing Night Immunity and killing King all the time.

Send a guard to investigative someone to see if they are the NK, or guard yourself making yourself Night Immune. (infinite)
